name: Trial started ‚Üí upgrade nudge
description:
Use this workflow to convert trial users based on intent, not deadlines.

Instead of blasting everyone with ‚Äúyour trial ends soon‚Äù emails, this workflow waits for signs that a user is actually using the product, then nudges them to upgrade, with a few well-timed reminders and a clear stop.

actions.name: Trial started
actions.description: A user has entered a trial period.

actions.name: High intent?
actions.description: Check if there are strong engagement signals.

value.html:
Hi there,

 

You’ve been putting the trial to good use – nice work.

 

If things are clicking and you want to keep going without limits, upgrading unlocks the full experience (and saves you from any “wait, why did this stop working?” moments).
Upgrade now

No rush – just a friendly nudge while it’s fresh.

 

Cheers,
The team

value.subject: Looks like you‚Äôre getting the hang of this üëÄ
value.preheader: Want to keep the momentum going?

actions.name: Upgraded?
actions.description: Check whether the user upgraded after the first nudge.

actions.name: Reminder email
actions.description: Send an upgrade reminder to the user.

value.html:
Hi there,

 

Quick follow-up while you’re still exploring.

 

If the trial has been useful so far, upgrading lets you keep everything running smoothly – no interruptions, no surprises.
Upgrade when ready

And if now’s not the moment, that’s okay too.

 

– The team

value.subject: Still thinking it over?
value.preheader: Totally fair. Just one more thing.

value.html:
Hi there,

 

This is our final upgrade nudge – promise.

 

If the trial has been working for you and you want to keep everything running, you can upgrade anytime here:
Upgrade now

If not, no worries at all. We’ll step back and let you explore on your own terms.

 

Thanks for trying things out,
The team
